attribute.name: generated_by
attribute.description: Name of the person who made the request

attribute.name: start_time
attribute.description: Time (possibly in in CDF Epoch3 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.msecZ) signifying beginning of the simulation

attribute.name: end_time
attribute.description: Time in CDF Epoch3 format (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.msecZ) signifying end of the simulation

attribute.name: kameleon_version
attribute.description: Version info for the kameleon converter used to create current file

attribute.name: generation_date
attribute.description: Date of generation or run request date

attribute.name: original_output_file_name
attribute.description: Name of the original model's data file that was converted to current CDF file

attribute.name: run_registration_number
attribute.description: CCMC Runs on Request registration number for runs submitted through online system
